price: 101. Dis : « Regardez donc ce qui est dans les cieux et sur terre !» Mais ni les Signes ni les avertissements ne pourraient servir à des gens qui ne croient pas.
arabic: قُلِ ٱنظُرُواْ مَاذَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِي ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: quli unẓurū mādhā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā tugh'nī al-āyātu wal-nudhuru ʿan qawmin lā yu'minūna
